message.original: <KC ATTACK1>後、少し遅らせて<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
message.translation: After pressing <KC ATTACK1>, delay a moment and then repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1>
Press <KC ATTACK1> while in the air.

message.original: <PADM>空中で左スティックを倒しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す<KEYM>空中で移動キーを押しながら<KC ATTACK1>を押す
message.translation: <PADM>While in the moving in the air with the left stick, press <KC ATTACK1> <KEYM> While in the moving in the air, press <KC ATTACK1>
Press <KC JUMP> while in the air.

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
message.translation: Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1> while climbing an enemy.

message.original: しがみつき中に<KC ATTACK1>を連続して押す
message.translation: Repeatedly press <KC ATTACK1> while climbing an enemy.

message.original: 敵の攻撃を引きつけて自身のスキルを放つ
message.translation: Activate a skill with perfect timing as an enemy attacks.
